name: dartwing-app

initializeCommand.ensure-adb-infrastructure: bash -c 'if docker ps --format "table {{.Names}}" | grep -q "^shared-adb-server$"; then echo "‚úÖ ADB server already running"; else echo "üîß ADB server not found - will attempt to start infrastructure..."; docker compose -p infrastructure -f ../../../infrastructure/mobile/android/adb/docker-compose.yml up -d 2>/dev/null || echo "‚ö†Ô∏è No ADB infrastructure available - manual setup may be required"; fi'

onCreateCommand.setup-flutter-project: echo 'Container created - Flutter setup will run on start'

postStartCommand: echo 'üöÄ Container started - initializing Flutter environment...'

bash -c 'echo "üîë Checking GitHub authentication..."; if gh auth status >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "‚úÖ GitHub CLI authenticated"; else echo "‚ö†Ô∏è GitHub not authenticated"; echo "To set up GitHub access, run one of:"; echo "  1) gh auth login          (interactive setup)"; echo "  2) gh auth login --web     (browser-based)"; echo "  3) Export GITHUB_TOKEN     (use personal token)"; echo "
Or set up SSH keys and run gh auth login"; fi'
